column3: News;Siem Reap:------ A foreign man was found dead at 8:30 pm on November 28
column5: in Ta Srey village. Sen Sok
column10: had apparently committed suicide by ------hanging------ himself from a tree close to where he stayed. The man came to the Kingdom of Cambodia on May 3
column12: via the Siem Reap International Airport.------ ------The landlord said that the victim had rented the room and lived alone since September 15
column14: and kept himself to himself.------.------ ------The deceased was taken to Siem Reap Referral Hospital to wait for family to arrive.------WARNING
